text:
Hi Everyone
I see the e-commerce scope is available only to professionals and enterprises.
but line items can be accessed in the starter, does it mean we can use e-commerce scope in starter as well to fetch line items API call ??

Hello,

I am planning to use the single send API, however the email contents include personalization tokens from the deal object.

Can the deal properties be passed as parameters in the single send API so that they will populate the dynamic content as required ?
New here so this may be a stupid question. Where do I find pageviews, sessions, etc in the API? I'm not seeing them using Fivetran and didn't see it in the API docs

Not sure is this what you are looking for but have you check these endpoints?
• <https://legacydocs.HubSpot.com/docs/methods/analytics/get-analytics-data-breakdowns>
• <https://legacydocs.HubSpot.com/docs/methods/analytics/get-analytics-data-by-object>
Did you select any scopes when you created the private app? More specifically, did you select this checkbox:

If you try to make call with terminal or from your app with this example, are you able to get answer:

```curl --request GET \
  --url <https://api.hubapi.com/cms/v3/blogs/posts> \
  --header 'authorization: Bearer PUT_YOUR_PRIVATE_APP_TOKEN_HERE'```

I'll try again, maybe someone has experience with this. Is there any way to associate a cookie with a contact from a non-HubSpot form other than with Forms API? Particularly using the scope of the <https://github.com/HubSpot/HubSpot-api-nodejs|HubSpot API NodeJS client library>. Thanks!
So I am using Integromat and am trying to query a deal's stage but when I do I only get numbers (presumably the stage ID) but no name. Can anyone help me with this?

Hi,
I am having issues setting the Postal Code of my contacts when creating them via the API. I've double checked that the property does exist in my HubSpot account (it's one managed by HubSpot). This is the error I am getting:
```{
       "category": "VALIDATION_ERROR",
       "correlationId": "19eb28c6-443f-4193-a46b-9a73806bd278",
       "message": "Property values were not valid: [{\"isValid\":false,\"message\":\"Property \\\"postal_code\\\" does not exist\",\"error\":\"PROPERTY_DOESNT_EXIST\",\"name\":\"postal_code\"}]",
       "status": "error",
      }```
Any ideas?

Hi Team, I’m having an error while setting up the oauth2 flow with Auth0. Essentially, because of the captcha in the authorization website, the previous callback to my redirect-uri is getting cancelled and a new callback is initiated. However, as a result of this, the provided state parameter is becoming stale. Any help will be highly appreciated. Thanks!
Here’s a snapshot from my developer console.
And if I don’t click on the captcha, then the callback never completes.

Hi
I see the "e-commerce" scope for oauth2.0 is available only to professionals and enterprises.
but HubSpot line items can be accessed in the starter, does it mean we can use "e-commerce" scope in starter as well to fetch line items via API call ??
